resources.string: This keyboard has been developed by the Aḷiyakaṭṭụ Tuḷuva Saṅgha (ATS) in collaboration with the Indigenous Animist Society (IAS). It has been conceived to accomodate the Tuḷu alphabet system with QWERTY - based ergonomics to aid ease of use and make typing Tuḷu much more accurate and simplified. The ATS Tulu keyboard allows one to type Tuḷu exactly the way one speaks their respective dialect, thus aiding in the preservation of diverse ancient indigenous pronunciations and accents present in various region-specific Tuḷu dialects extant across Tulu Nāḍụ state. The ATS Tulu keyboard can also be used for typing the Tuḷu sister language known as Korrè (Koraga Language). We hope you put the ATS Tulu keyboard to good use.
Enable ATS Tulu Keyboard in Setting
Choose ATS Tulu Keyboard in Dialog
Pressing keys will play a sound
Please enable and choose ATS Tulu Keyboard
Thanks for using ATS Tulu Keyboard
